# Managing Your Apps And Integrations

**URL:** https://www.mangomint.com/learn/managing-your-apps-and-integrations/

## Category
17 Integrations

## Subcategory
N/A

## Article Content

HOME
APPS & INTEGRATIONS
Managing Your Apps & Integrations
IN THIS ARTICLE
Offers
Payroll Processing
Gift Cards
Packages
Memberships
Intelligent Waitlist
Forms
Resources
Service Customizations
Flows
Email Campaigns
Time Clock
Cash Drawer
Purchase Orders
Shopify (Integration)
Webhooks (Integration)
Mailchimp (Integration)
WaiverForever (Integration)
Gift Up! (Integration)

This article covers all the available apps and integrations in Mangomint.

If you are an Admin user, you can manage your apps and integrations by going to Apps > Manage apps.

Link copied
Offers

Create flexible discounts and promo codes that make it simple to reward loyal clients and drive more bookings. Learn more about Offers & Discounts.

Link copied
Payroll Processing

Process payroll for employees, contractors, and multiple compensation types. Our Payroll Processing app handles deductions, tax payments, calculations, and filings. Learn more about Payroll Processing.

Link copied
Gift Cards

Sell digital gift cards and gift card promotions directly on your website and through your online booking. You can also sell physical gift cards in-store. Learn more about Gift Cards.

Link copied
Packages

Sell bundled services at a discounted price. You can easily track package sales and view details for each client, including purchase date, remaining service quantities, and usage history. Learn more about Packages.

Link copied
Memberships

Build reliable cash flow and boost client retention. Create and sell custom membership plans that renew on a recurring basis and charge clients automatically. Learn more about Memberships.

Link copied
Intelligent Waitlist

Add clients to your waitlist when their preferred provider or appointment time isn’t available. Our Intelligent Waitlist automatically tracks incoming waitlist entries and instantly notifies you when there’s an opening. Learn more about the Intelligent Waitlist.

Link copied
Forms

Create and collect important forms. Set up custom templates for client-facing forms, external forms, or internal forms such as SOAP notes. Automatically send forms to clients and keep track of form submissions. Learn more about Forms & Charting.

Link copied
Resources

Assign limited resources such as rooms or equipment to your services. Manage resource capacity and view resource availability on the calendar. Learn more about Resources.

Link copied
Service Customizations

Deliver personalized experiences and increase revenue with service add-ons. Adjust pricing, service duration, and more for every customization option. Learn more about Service Customizations.

Link copied
Flows

Create sequences that automatically send texts and emails to clients or staff based on triggering actions and specific client criteria. Learn more about Automated Flows.

Link copied
Email Campaigns

Create promotions, announcements, newsletters, and other campaigns with our intuitive email builder and ready-to-use templates. Learn more about Campaigns.

Link copied
Time Clock

Track your staff’s working hours and time spent on paid and unpaid tasks. Assign unique PIN numbers for clocking in and out, manage time cards, and generate Time Clock reports. Learn more about the Time Clock.

Link copied
Cash Drawer

Manage your cash sales directly inside Mangomint. You can add new pay-ins and pay-outs, perform daily counts and closeouts, and pay out your staff's tips in cash. Learn more about the Cash Drawer.

Link copied
Purchase Orders

Create lists of products and quantities to order from each supplier based on preset inventory preferences. Check current stock levels against how many products you want on hand so you always order just the right amount. Learn more about Purchase Orders.

Link copied
Shopify (Integration)

Use our Shopify integration to sync product inventory seamlessly between Mangomint and your Shopify online store. Learn more about our Shopify integration.

Link copied
Webhooks (Integration)

Our Webhooks integration allows you to send event data from Mangomint to other third-party applications. Learn more about our Webhooks integration.

Link copied
Mailchimp (Integration)

Our Mailchimp integration syncs client details—including email address and phone number—from Mangomint to Mailchimp, allowing you to create and send campaigns using Mailchimp. Learn more about our Mailchimp integration.

Note: 

Mangomint's Campaigns and Flows apps are available to use instead of our Mailchimp integration. With campaigns and flows, you can send targeted marketing messages directly through Mangomint—no integration required.

Link copied
WaiverForever (Integration)

Our WaiverForever integration allows you to store completed WaiverForever forms on client timelines in Mangomint. Learn more about our WaiverForever integration.

Note: 

Mangomint's Forms app is available to use instead of our WaiverForever integration. With the Forms app, you can create and collect forms directly in Mangomint—no integration required.

Link copied
Gift Up! (Integration)

Our Gift Up! integration automatically adds any gift cards sold in Gift Up! to Mangomint. Learn more about our Gift Up! integration.

Note: 

Mangomint's Gift Cards app is available to use instead of our Gift Up! integration. With the Gift Cards app, you can sell gift cards in-store and online—no integration required.

Can't find what you're looking for?

Start a chat with us to talk to a real person and get your questions answered, or browse our on-demand videos.
